trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Skowhegan
There were no other sightings in Skowhegan on or around March 19th 2012
divs: Sighting Detailsat a friends house, watching tv, my friend saw it and pointed it out, when i first saw it i thought it was a comet, but there were no comets reported today, the object was a bar, cigar shape, white and moved in a single direction then slowly changed, i was shocked when i saw that there wernt any comet sightings, the object finally went behind the trees in the horizon
